summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, discussing a personal matter involving Staley's daughter and a meeting with Lisa Randall, a physicist. The email emphasizes confidentiality and attorney-client privilege.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing a personal matter related to his acquaintance's daughter.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email, which pertains to his daughter and a meeting with Lisa Randall.

persons.name: Lisa Randall
persons.context: Randall is mentioned as someone who will spend time with Staley's daughter discussing women in physics.

Staley's daughter is set to meet with Randall to discuss women in physics.

The email emphasizes confidentiality and potential attorney-client privilege.
